body.p: Recently, Ceki Gülcü presented the top 10 reasons for migrating your projects to logback. Issues such as migration strategy, new APIs, SLF4J and Joran were be discussed. Emphasis was given to practical aspects and a live demo rather than relatively theoretical considerations. If you were not able to attend the presentation (or even if you were there), you can download the slides that Ceki used.
